title: Gothic Heat
description: Paula Beckett has a problem. The spirit of the wicked and voluptuous sorceress Isidora Katori is trying to possess her body and Paula finds herself driven by dark desires and a delicious wanton recklessness. Rafe Hathaway is irresistibly drawn to both women. But who will he finally choose? Feisty and sexy Paula, who is fighting impossible odds to hang on to her very existence, or sultry and ruthless Isidora who offers him the key to immortal life?
author: Portia Da Costa
